article_title: The Pay-Equity Police Get New Ammunition
article_text:
Feminists have something new to celebrate on April 12 this year. That’s the date they have dubbed “Equal Pay Day,” when they claim that women’s earnings have finally caught up to men’s earnings from the year before. Each April activists hold demonstrations and call on Congress to pass the misguided Paycheck Fairness Act.

The legislation would, among other things, require the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission to collect wage data from firms “by the sex, race, and national origin of employees.” First proposed in 1997,...

twitter.description: Diana Furchtgott-Roth writes that President Obama loads another burden on business: Be prepared to report on employees by 14 gender, race or ethnicity groups, within 12 pay bands.
twitter.title: The Pay-Equity Police Get New Ammunition

image.alt: The Pay-Equity Police Get New Ammunition
